node.title: BOM declares La Niña as the east prepares for another sodden end to the week
node.alt: Storm clouds loom over a beach.
node.description: We've finally reached La Niña threshold, indicating conditions are primed for rain. On cue, the east is expecting heavy rainfall over the coming days with more flooding on the cards.
node.content:
["The Bureau of Meteorology has declared a\u00a0La Ni\u00f1a, the climate driver typically associated with wet conditions for eastern and northern Australia over summer.", "The announcement comes as more\u00a0heavy rain is forecast for the east.", "Two tropical air masses are expected to collide over the continent this week, bringing widespread rainfall.", "Storms and renewed river rises are possible as the system slowly makes its way east.", "", "
Heavy falls are expected to sweep through from west to east over the coming days.(Supplied: Bureau of Meteorology)
", "
What is a La Ni\u00f1a ?
", "The climate driver occurs when there are cooler than average waters in the eastern\u00a0Pacific Ocean and warmer waters in the west.", "This results in stronger than average trade winds and more moisture over northern and eastern Australia.", "Conditions have been slowly creeping\u00a0towards\u00a0La Ni\u00f1a\u00a0over the past few months.", "The BOM's latest three-month\u00a0outlook indicates wetter than average conditions are expected for parts of eastern Australia.", "
Summer is almost here
", "This season's severe weather outlook suggests\u00a0the risk of flooding is above average for the east and north this year, with a\u00a0slightly above average risk of tropical cyclones.", "The first tropical cyclone of the season was officially named Cyclone Paddy on Tuesday night as it\u00a0reached category 1\u00a0strength over the Indian Ocean, south-east of Christmas Island.", "This cyclone comes\u00a0slightly earlier than normal, as would be expected in a La Ni\u00f1a year.", "Cyclone Paddy is expected to head west and drop back below cyclone status in the early hours of Wednesday morning.", "Back in the east, with many catchments already sodden, flooding is on the cards as the rain sets in again this week.", "Keep up with your local warnings at ABC Emergency"]
